headline: BofA Boosts Lam Research (LRCX) Target to $100 Amid DRAM Tailwinds
summary: Lam Research Corp. (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of the 10 best tech stocks to buy according to billionaires right now. In a recent update dated June 9, BofA Securities analyst Vivek Arya reiterated his Buy rating on Lam Research and raised the stock’s price target to $100 (up from $90), driven by a more constructive outlook on NAND, […]
